name: WiFi Device Proximity Locator
description: Locate nearby WiFi devices (access points and clients) by their signal strength with real-time proximity indicators and tracking features

parameters.name: Wi-Fi Interface
parameters.description: The wireless interface to use for scanning

parameters.name: Scan Time
parameters.description: Time in seconds to scan for devices

parameters.name: Scan Mode
parameters.description: Type of devices to scan for

parameters.name: Target Device (Optional)
parameters.description: MAC address of specific device to track (leave empty to track all devices)

parameters.name: Continuous Scan
parameters.description: Continuously scan and update signal strength readings

parameters.name: Proximity Alerts
parameters.description: Enable alerts when a device comes within close proximity

parameters.name: Proximity Threshold
parameters.description: Signal strength threshold to trigger proximity alert (dBm)
